In England, in the seven days to 05 January, there were 1,053,451 new confirmed cases (1,862.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 December, there were 865,003 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 22% (188,448 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 10 January is 12,370,121 (21,874.6 cases per 100,000 population).
